mapper.select: select * from rpt_toe_ma order by happen_date desc limit #{from}, 20
mapper.insert: insert into rpt_toe_ma (ma_id, toe_code, toe_name, toe_uuid, happen_date, start_date, tips, target_name, target_uuid, target_relation, target_industry, buyer_name, buyer_toe_uuid, buyer_toe_code, buyer_type, buyer_relation, buyer_industry, buyer_stock_num, buyer_stock_rate, owner_name, owner_toe_uuid, owner_toe_code, owner_type, owner_relation, owner_industry, owner_stock_num, owner_stock_rate, ma_season, ma_type, pay_mode, pay, pay_kind, trans_price, trans_kind, target_type, trans_stock_rate, if_changed, create_time, update_time, abst) values (#{maId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{happenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerToeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerToeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerStockNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buyerStockRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerToeUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerToeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerStockNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ownerStockRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{payKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transStockRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ifChanged,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{abst,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
